attributes.action: Request that it be an offense to spam others with random petition emails
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do your friends keep sending you info on petitions that they have no idea if you are interested in or not? Please don't forward this petition to anyone!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
